dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.CustomerBillingCycleSpecification
dataStructure.description:
A detailed description of when to initiate a billing cycle and the various sub steps of a billing cycle.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerBillingCycleSpecification

child.name: name
child.description:
A short descriptive name.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this component.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the CustomerBillingCycleSpecification is valid.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: billingDateShift
child.description:
An offset of a billing date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: billingDateShift

child.name: chargeDateOffset
child.description:
An offset of a date through which charges previously received by the billing system will appear on the bill. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: chargeDateOffset

child.name: creditDateOffset
child.description:
An offset of a date through which credits previously received by the billing system will appear on the bill. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: creditDateOffset

child.name: mailingDateOffset
child.description:
An offset of a customer bill mailing date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: mailingDateOffset

child.name: paymentDueDateOffset
child.description:
An offset of a payment due date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the BillingPeriod.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: paymentDueDateOffset

child.name: billingPeriod
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association BillingCycleRecurrenceDescribedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: billingPeriod

child.name: customerBillingCycle
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association BillingCycleSpecDescribes

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBillingCycle

child.name: customerBillSpec
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CycleSpecSchedulesCreationOfBillDescribedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBillSpec
